name: Game programmer (intern)
description:
Game programmer (internship)

Darktheme Studios is Looking for New Talent for the Game Developer/Producer Position!

Are you ready to start your career in game development? We are Darktheme Studios, partners of the creators of some of the most popular games on the Roblox platform, and we are looking for talented individuals for our new Accelerator project. If you want to grow, learn, and see the results of your work in real-time, then we’re waiting for you to join our team!

About Us:

We are partners of one of top-3 companies on Roblox. Our games have become global hits, played by millions of users worldwide. We have extensive experience in creating successful Roblox games, and we want to share it with you!

About Your Role:

As part of the program, you’ll have a unique opportunity to lead your own game studio. You will have complete creative freedom to bring your boldest ideas to life, manage a team, and oversee every stage of game development.

Your results will be visible immediately—the success and growth of your games will reflect your achievements. Additionally, you’ll be learning from a team of experts who have created some of the best games on Roblox, gaining valuable knowledge and skills to take your studio to the next level.

What You’ll Be Doing:

  • Managing a team of developers and creating your own games on Roblox

  • Leading projects from concept to completion, ensuring high-quality standards

  • Testing and applying different strategies to grow your studio and achieve game success

  • Actively participating in training sessions and working alongside our Roblox experts

What We Expect from You:

  • Any experience in game development

  • Good spoken English (B2+)

  • A strong desire to learn, grow, and develop professionally

  • Excellent organizational and project management skills

  • Interest in growing within Roblox

  • Experience working with Roblox and knowledge of Lua would be an advantage

Why Join Us?

  • Learn from the creators of some of the most popular games on Roblox

  • Gain invaluable experience in managing a development studio

  • Work with experienced developers from our core team, who will mentor and guide you

At Darktheme Studios, we strive to unlock the potential of every developer. If you are a talented and ambitious developer ready to grow with us, we would love to see your application!

Create the future of gaming with us
